</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all items assigned to the given weapon in given cargo container.
<template lineStart="1"><title>warning</title><part><name index="1"/><value>This is unofficial documentation. All Information here is as it exists in the Engine. It might not reflect the reality.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> container: [[Object]] - cargo container  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
